node.text:
If you find yourself or your team bogged down by typical day-to-day activities, then how about booking a Corporate Day Out Package at The Raviz Kovalam! Switch on the mini vacation mode right away!

Package Details: INR 2500 + tax es(per person)
Inclusions - Welcome drink, Hi-tea , Lunch@Terrace
Indoor outdoor team building activities at additional costs
One garden view room for freshen ups (for 3 hours as per availability)

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
